com.phunware.dataex.asset

Interface AssetManager.BalanceListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    AssetManager

    public static AssetManager.BalanceListener

    Listener for use in querying the user's current Digital Assets balance

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFailure(java.lang.String message)
      Unable to get the user's Digital Assets balance. This could happen for a variety of reasons:
      void onSuccess(java.util.List<com.phunware.dataex.asset.Asset> assets)
      Will return successful if the user is eligible and opted in.

    • Method Detail

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess(java.util.List<com.phunware.dataex.asset.Asset> assets)

        Will return successful if the user is eligible and opted in.

        Parameters:
        assets -

      • onFailure

        void onFailure(java.lang.String message)

        Unable to get the user's Digital Assets balance. This could happen for a variety of reasons:

        • Server error

        • User not opted in

        • User's Advertising ID has changed since opt in

        • User has opted out of Personalized Ads

        Parameters:
        message - Message indicating why failure occurred
